title: Monk
content: Stealth checks. Stick to the dark and avoid enemy sightlines. Attacking or casting a spell will reveal your location. Shadow Arts: Pass Without Trace: Call forth a veil of shadow and silence that gives you and nearby allies a +10 bonus to Stealth checks. Shadow Arts: Darkness: Create a cloud of magical darkness that Heavily Obscures and Blinds creatures within. Creatures cannot make ranged attacks into or out of it.
